properties.Proposed_m: 1. Live fencing/SALT  - 5000 m/ 2. Lock and spills - 500 m/ 3. Stone terracing - 500 m/ 4. Agronomic practices should be adapted at optimum level (conservation tillage, crop rotation and diversification, cover crops, mulching, contour farming, windbreaks
